description: Lists storage container URLs with shared access signatures (SAS) for uploading and downloading Asset content. The signatures are derived from the storage account keys.

subscription_id.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

api_version.description: The Version of the API to be used with the client request.

permissions.description: The permissions to set on the SAS URL.

expirytime.description: The SAS URL expiration time.  This must be less than 24 hours from the current time.
